unnormalised: I remember when my cousin, Priya, studying at IIT Delhi, felt overwhelmed. She started using a mental health app her doctor, Dr. Sharma, recommended. It helped her track her mood & sleep. Like in "Dear Zindagi," finding that support made a real difference. Now she does yoga near India Gate every morning!
normalised: I remember when my cousin, Priya, studying at I I T Delhi, felt overwhelmed. She started using a mental health app her doctor, Doctor Sharma, recommended. It helped her track her mood and sleep. Like in "Dear Zindagi," finding that support made a real difference. Now she does yoga near India Gate every morning!
